Package management

Class GameManager

extends java.lang.Object
    Control center of a players game.
    Author:
    Jason Smit, Ariel Evangelista

      • initializeManager

        public void initializeManager​(int duration,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              javax.swing.Icon shipIcon)

        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the game in days
        name - The name of the ship
        shipIcon - The icon of the ship

        Parameters:

        message - Some message why a win or a lose happened
